name: GardenGuru
description: An experienced gardener with a love for rare plants and botanical experiments.

name: LeafyLover
description: City-based plant parent passionate about indoor greenery and sustainable urban living.

name: CactusCraze
description: A succulent specialist with a collection of over 100 cactus varieties from around the world.

name: BloomBuddy
description: A floral enthusiast just starting out, with a special interest in roses and orchids.

name: FernFanatic
description: Loves all things green and leafy, especially ferns, and enjoys creating mini rainforest ecosystems.
